short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed Up Your Searches: Get Direct Answers from ChatGPT - No More Wading Through Endless Results!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸš€ AI Chat is a browser extension that shows AI responses alongside Google, Bing, and other search engines. It revolutionizes the way we access information by seamlessly integrating search functionality with chat, leveraging the capabilities of large language models like ChatGPT to enhance your daily searching experience.

âœ¨ Distinct from OpenAI ChatGPT, AI Chat employs Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) as its core technology, ensuring that the answers it provides are enriched and informed by the latest data available across the web.

Experience the future of search with AI Chat's innovative features:

- Direct integration with leading search engines eg. Google, enabling a comprehensive search experience.
- The ability to generate informed responses based on real-time search results, delivering accurate and up-to-date information.
